title: Dick Smith: make-up artist
creator_credit: Texture Films and David E. Smith
brief_description: Dick Smith talks about his work as a make up artist for the motion picture industry. He shows the aging techniques he used on Dustin Hoffman in ‘Little Big Man’ and Marlon Brando in ‘The Godfather’. Narrated by David Luster.
